page.title: 11TRADE, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Shops. In the village there are five food shops which are all situated on the east side of the village. Most of these shops stock similar sorts of food. There are five non-food shops, two ladies hairdressers, two newsagents and a chemists. There are two hot food take away shops, one is a Chinese food shop and the other an Italian fish and chip shop. There is also a butchers shop. The post office in the village is also a general dealers. {Garage. There is one garage which provides a full service. The forecourt is a filling station with a repair workshop alongside. {Library. There is a County library which is
